author: kanagwa
content:
> we donâ€™t publish the crate to crates.io but you can pull the consensus/types crate from Lighthouse by adding a types dependency pointing at the Lighthouse github repo (the eip4844 branch). You need to use some patch overrides to make sure all the dependency versions match, thereâ€™s an example of this here: https://github.com/michaelsproul/blockdreamer/blob/main/Cargo.toml

Sharing here for reference.
